title: Ez's Slow Cooker Hot Chili
directions: In a large skillet over medium heat, saute the onion, green bell pepper and garlic in the oil for 5 minutes, or until tender. Stir in the beef and cook until brown.  Transfer these ingredients to a slow cooker.
Then, to the slow cooker, add tomato-vegetable juice, soup, chili beans, cayenne pepper, chili powder, soy sauce and water.
Cover slow cooker and cook on low setting for 2 hours.
